pkgmetadata.longdescription: Angie is a powerful and scalable web server, evolving the ideas of nginx: - Created by former nginx developers to move in a new direction. - Serves as a replacement for its predecessor, without requiring reconfiguration and module redevelopment. - Includes all the features of nginx 1.27.3 and adds a number of new functions.

use.flag: Enable support of asynchronous file I/O (AIO) on FreeBSD and Linux
